converge

Class AddEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • converge.AddEvent

  • public class AddEvent
extends java.lang.Object
    The AddEvent.java file will be used to implement the Admin Mode for the Converge Application
    Since:
    2017-09-15
    Author:
    Vivek Tallavajhala

      vector that hold integers 0-47 that each represent time availability in 30 minute periods throughout the day.

      Scanner object initialized to handle user interaction.

      • twelveHourConversion

        public java.lang.String twelveHourConversion(int i)
        This is a method that will take in ints placed in the availability vectors and will convert it into its corresponding time string for 12 hour mode.
        Parameters:
        i - This is the integer value given to the method.
        Returns:
        A string representing the integers corresponding time string.

      • twentyFourHourConversion

        Returns:

      • twelveHourtoInt

        public static int twelveHourtoInt(java.lang.String time)
        Converts time strings for 12 hour mode as its corresponding integer for the availability vectors.
        Parameters:
        time - The time as a string that the user inputs in 12 hour mode.
        Returns:
        an integer representing the time string's corresponding integer for the availability vector.
